= Flash Authoring =

About Flash font embedding:

  * [http://www.adobe.com/devnet/flash/quickstart/embedding_fonts/ Adobe - Flash Quick Starts: Embedding fonts]

= Flex / Flex SDK  =

== `[Embed]` metatag ==

Dedicated class way

{{{
package  
{
	import flash.text.Font;
	
	[Embed(source = "Cyberbit.ttf", fontStyle = "regular", fontName = "Cyberbit")]
	public class Cyberbit extends Font
	{
		
	}
}
}}}

Class variable way

{{{
[Embed(source = "Cyberbit.ttf", fontStyle = "regular", fontName = "Cyberbit")]
var Cyberbit:Class;
}}}

Supported parameters:

|| `source` || Location of font file (TTF or OTF) ||
|| `systemFont` || OS font name (like "Arial") ||
|| `sourceList` || liste of font file or OS font ||
|| `mimeType` || define MIME type of embedded resource. Supported value for fonts are `application/x-font-truetype` for TTF (TrueType) and `application/x-font` for system font ||
|| `fontFamily` || Name of font family like "Helvetica" or "Futura" ||
|| `fontName` || Exact name of font like "Helvetica Neue 55 Roman" ||
|| `unicodeRange` || Unicode ranges like `U+0041-U+005A` or named ranges (from config xml) ||
|| `fontStyle` || Font style. The valid values are `normal`, `italic` and `oblique`. The default value is `normal`. ||
|| `fontWeight` || Font weight. The valid values are `normal`, `bold` and `heavy`. The default value is `normal`. ||
|| `cff`^1^ || The valid values are `true` or `false`. The default value is `true`. ||
|| `advancedAntiAliasing` || Advanced anti-aliasing. The valid values are `true` and `false`. The default value is `true` ||
<wiki:comment>
|| `fontGridFitType` || The valid values are `none`, `pixel`, and `subpixel`. The default value is `pixel`. ||
|| `fontSharpness` || (-400 <> 400) The default value is 0. ||
|| `fontThickness` || (-200 <> 200) The default value is 0. ||
</wiki:comment>

  # Flex 4+ / Flash 10 only

One of `source`, `systemFont` or `sourceList` must be used.

== `@font-face` ==

{{{
@font-face
{
    src: url("Cyberbit.ttf");
    fontFamily: Cyberbit;
    fontWeight: bold;
}
 
Application
{
    font-family: Cyberbit;
}
}}}
